name: European Federation of Steel Wire Rope Industries
membership: National Associations in Germany, Italy,Portugal .  Individual producing companies in the other Member States
memberOrga: DSV, Federacciai, Associacao dos industriais de cordoaria y redes
goal: To co-ordinate, animate, defend and promote the common interests of our European members. Sending information organising meetings of the different Committees, lobbying in Brussels ..
interests: Competition, Customs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Internal Market, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: Trade Modernisation process, antidumping , antisubsidies, EU MES China, EU FTA, Innovation,, Research and Development
